original_title: Painting A Portrait on the Fringe
overview: The city of Krems is divided in two. East lies modern and industrial Krems-Ost. West lies the Wachau valley, UNESCO world heritage. "Painting a portrait: On the fringe of world heritage" tells the story of three painters who lived and worked in the Wachau at the turn of the 19th century.
title: Painting A Portrait on the Fringe
